dc_title_s: Offshore Platforms in the Gulf of Mexico, 2011
dc_description_s: This point shapefile shows the location of platforms in Gulf Of Mexico. All platforms existing in the database are included.This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing information on offshore platforms in the Gulf of Mexico and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
